title: Standard PLA Print
description: Basic PLA print for everyday prototypes and models
details: Standard PLA material in various colors. 0.2mm layer height, 20% infill. Typical turnaround 2-3 days.

title: Premium PETG Print
description: Durable PETG prints for functional parts
details: High-quality PETG material with excellent layer adhesion. 0.15mm layer height, 30% infill. 3-4 day turnaround.

title: Resin Detail Print
description: Ultra-detailed resin prints for miniatures and jewelry
details: 8K resin printing with 0.05mm layer resolution. Perfect for detailed models. Washed and UV-cured. 4-5 day turnaround.

title: Starter Bundle
description: Get started with 3 basic PLA prints and consultation
details: Includes three standard PLA prints (up to 100g each) plus a 30-minute design consultation. Save 20% compared to individual pricing.

title: Custom Large Format Print
details: Contact us for custom pricing on large format prints. Various materials available. Lead time depends on project complexity.
